architecture_patterns.name: Docker Compose Multi-Service Deployment
architecture_patterns.description: Orchestrate HeadlessX browser automation + BrightData proxy services with Docker Compose

implementation.approach: Single docker-compose.yml with health checks, volume management, and network isolation
trade_offs: Initial learning curve for Docker commands

architecture_patterns.success_criteria: All services running with passing health checks within 30 seconds

architecture_patterns.name: Mock HTML Parser Testing
architecture_patterns.description: Validate parser selectors with static HTML when browser rendering unavailable
architecture_patterns.success_criteria: Description extraction >50 chars, contains expected keywords

architecture_patterns.name: Adapter Pattern for API Incompatibility
architecture_patterns.description: Create adapter classes when third-party APIs don't match internal interfaces

implementation.approach: Inherit from base class, implement required methods with API-specific logic
implementation.issue_encountered: Browserless container API incompatible with BaseHeadlessXClient
implementation.resolution: Documented blocker, pivoted to alternative testing strategy

architecture_patterns.lessons_learned: Verify API compatibility before integration. Method signature mismatches require full adapter implementation or interface redesign.
